name: language-lolcode
readme:
# [LOLCODE](http://lolcode.org/) language support in Atom

Adds syntax highlighting and snippets to [LOLCODE](http://lolcode.org/) files in Atom.

Originally [converted](http://atom.io/docs/latest/converting-a-text-mate-bundle)
from the [LOLCODE TextMate bundle](https://github.com/marioaquino/LOLcode.tmbundle).

Contributions are greatly appreciated. Please fork this repository and open a
pull request to add snippets, make grammar tweaks, etc.
